message.content: {"given_definition_quality":60,"better_definition":"particle used at the end of a sentence to turn it into a question or to emphasize something already mentioned","sentence":"你呢？","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style image: two people facing each other and talking, with one person looking curious, soft lighting, hazy colors, post-apocalyptic background hints, focus on facial expressions and communication, subtle environmental details suggesting a changed world.","sentence_translation":"And you?"}
